info.description: This is the API server for i-Manage application.
info.title: i-Manage API

post.description: Check if an email is already registered

get.description: Get a paginated list of all iComs
Get iCom details including board and actions

delete.description: Delete iCom and all related data

post.description: Add a member to the board of directors

delete.description: Remove a member from the board

get.description: Get top shops by ranking type

post.description: Toggle like status for a shop by a visitor (guest support)

get.description: Check if a visitor has liked a shop

post.description: Add a shop to iCom (creates new iShop in this iCom with location details)
Filter members by name (query), industry, location (province/district/ward), status, rank

delete.description: Remove a shop from iCom membership

put.description: Set custom display order for a member (lower numbers appear first)

get.description: Get unique industries and areas within an iCom for filter populating
Search members across all fields (name, industry, location) within iCom scope

delete.description: Delete iShop and remove from all iComs

get.description: List all iCom memberships for a shop

lat.description: Required for geo-search and map display

lng.description: Required for geo-search and map display

allowed_industries.description: Configuration fields (stored as JSON strings in Redis)
Configuration fields (stored as JSON strings in Redis)
